products.title: Luxari PVC Blackout Beige 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Luxari pvc blackout beige 89mm vertical blind in cream. Made to measure from 14.14 with free uk mainland delivery. This 89mm vertical blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their luxari pvc blackout range is available in classic colours and is ideal for damp rooms or areas that are exposed to heat. 
 
This beige vertical blind is made from a pvc fabric so is therefore waterproof and flame retardant - perfect for kitchens and bathrooms!
 
 Product id: sdb-vtb0971 fabric colour: beige material: fiberglass core laminated with pvc layered coating lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable   slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.title: Hanson Sand (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure hanson sand (blackout) blackout vertical blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality blackout vertical blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm
 	min drop: 300mm max drop: 2913mm
 	fabric composition: polyester
 	louvre width: 89mm
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	fittings: included
 	controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: a choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
